snippet: Gunmen stormed a bus in Egypt’s Sinai Peninsula on Friday, kidnapping two American tourists and an Egyptian tour guide, Egyptian officials said.

byline.original: By LIAM STACK and J. DAVID GOODMAN
byline.contributor: Liam Stack reported from Cairo and J. David Goodman from Cairo. Mayy El Sheikh contributed reporting from Cairo.

lead_paragraph: Gunmen stormed a bus in Egypt’s Sinai Peninsula on Friday, kidnapping two American tourists and an Egyptian tour guide, Egyptian officials said.

headline.seo: Two American Tourists Kidnapped in Egypt, Officials Say
headline.main: Two Americans Kidnapped in Egypt Are Released, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Two Americans Kidnapped in Egypt Are Released, Officials Say
